scripts.dirs: for dir in ./src ./dist ./test ./util ./types; do mkdir -p $dir; done
scripts.init: bun run dirs && bun run util && bun run @ && bun run ts;
scripts.build: rm -r ./types ; tsc && bun build ./src/index.ts --outdir ./dist --minify --packages external --target bun && rollup -c ./util/rollup.config.js
